name: 2048 Color
tagline: A color version of Original 2048 game created by Gabriele. This version is updated by Kishore Chandra Sahoo.
body:
### Welcome to 2048 COLOR Game site.
This game is modified by Kishore Chandra Sahoo from the original 2048 game created by Gabriele. This site is created with help of Github automatic page generator. Going forward there will be further modification to this game and updates will be published via same link.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
